description.p: You live in the shadows, your true identity shrouded in secrecy, while another identity allows you to navigate the tumultuous world of Tanares with ease. Perhaps you pose as a humble farmer, a stoic soldier, or even something more sinister. You have spent so much time in this other skin that it feels like a part of you, and you are recognized for it even in other regions. With the growing tensions of the Cold War, your unique ability to move unnoticed between your two identities provides a distinct advantage, allowing you to gather invaluable information for espionage purposes. But as the stakes become higher, the lines between your true self and your other identity begin to blur, and the risk of being discovered looms ever larger.

ul.li: Equipment: Two sets of common clothes, two sets of documents for each identity, a sturdy bag, and small pouch containing 15 gp.

description.p: In a world wrought with instability and strife, the value of secrecy and stealth cannot be overstated. Espionage reigns supreme and those with the ability to blend in seamlessly with their surroundings are highly prized. Such individuals re often aloof, with a guarded air about them as they keep their true identities close to the vest. Every step they take, every word they utter, is calculated to maintain their disguise. The weight of their responsibility can lead to paranoia, constantly scanning their surroundings for any hint of danger.

Yet, not all who walk in shadows are wrought with anxiety. Some have a natural magnetism, a charm that allows them to slip into a role like a second skin. They possess an innate ability to blend in with the most disparate of crowds, effortlessly becoming someone else entirely. But, even for those with a silver tongue, maintaining multiple identities is an arduous task. One slip-up, one careless mistake, and the consequences can be dire. A moment’s distraction can bring an end to their carefully crafted charade and plunge them into the heart of danger.

select.name: Personality Trait
select.item: I am constantly aware of my surroundings and the people around me, analyzing their every move and trying to anticipate their next actions.
I dislike my real identity and I secretly enjoy my cover-up identity and life more than my real one.
Empires rise and fall, and I want to be there to witness it all, in the heat of the political intrigue games.
The weight of my double life can be overwhelming, causing me to withdraw from time to time and keep to myself as I struggle to maintain my two identities.
I am always looking for new information to gather and use for espionage purposes, willing to take risks and push boundaries to get what I need.
My past is shrouded in mystery, and even I am not sure where my true loyalties lie. I must constantly remind myself of my mission and the greater good to stay on track.

select.name: Ideal
select.item: New Life. My new persona allows me to help those in need without the burden of my past mistakes. (Good)
The Greater Good. The information I gather, even through questionable means, serves a greater purpose for the safety and stability of Tanares. (Lawful)
Power and Control. With my dual identities and knowledge of others' secrets, I will hold immense power and control over those around me. (Evil)
Freedom. My own freedom and success are my top priorities, even if it means betraying others. (Chaotic)
Mercenary. The information I gather has immense value, and I will sell it to the highest bidder. (Neutral)
Survivor. I will do whatever it takes to survive and achieve my goals, even if it means sacrificing my true identity. (Any)

select.name: Bond
select.item: I have formed deep and meaningful connections with my contacts and will do anything to protect them and ensure their safety.
The fate of two or more people rests on my ability to gather information and maintain my cover, and I will not let them down.
My true loyalty lies with a specific organization or individual, and I will do whatever it takes to further their goals and protect their interests.
I have been given a specific mission by my organization or employer, and I will not rest until it is accomplished, even if it means sacrificing my personal safety.
I have fallen in love with someone who I must keep at a distance for fear of revealing my true identity, but I will do everything in my power to protect them from harm.
I have become emotionally attached to a civilian who knows me only as my false identity, and I must constantly remind myself that my feelings are based on a lie and could lead to danger if revealed.

select.name: Flaw
select.item: I am haunted by my past mistakes and the people I've hurt while operating under my previous identity.
I have used my undercover persona for personal gain, sometimes at the expense of others.
I have developed close relationships with people who I must betray or distance myself from to maintain my cover.
I have obtained sensitive information through illegal or unethical means, making me vulnerable to being blackmailed or exposed.
My two identities have become so intertwined that I struggle to remember which one is my true self.
The power and freedom that comes with my new identity has made me arrogant and overconfident, causing me to take dangerous risks without considering the consequences.

description.p: You possess a second identity that you’ve developed over the years, complete with the necessary documentation to authenticate each persona. You are known by one identity or the other, depending on the region or location you’re in. Your extensive experience in living a double life has made you an expert in secrecy, and you must not need to make any ability check when trying to make people believe you are one of your two established identities.
